EmailTemplate.description: This letter head is for Retail sales rep
EmailTemplate.name: Retail Case HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Type}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A new case has been created by: {!Case.CreatedBy} with the below details.{!Case.Link}Subject: {!Case.Subject}Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}Contact: {!Case.Contact}Type: {!Case.Type}
